edu.rit.pjmr

Class SourceConfig<I,C,K,V extends Vbl>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pjmr.SourceConfig<I,C,K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - Mapper's data record ID data type.
    C - Mapper's data record contents data type.
    K - Mapper's output key data type.
    V - Mapper's output value data type; must implement interface Vbl.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable

    public class SourceConfig<I,C,K,V extends Vbl>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Streamable
    Class SourceConfig contains specifications for configuring a Source in a mapper task.

    • Method Detail

      • mapper

        public <T extends Mapper<I,C,K,V>> MapperConfig<I,C,K,V> mapper(java.lang.Class<T> mapperClass,
                                                       java.lang.String... args)
        Add the given Mapper to this source. A source must have at least one mapper; it may have more than one mapper. The argument strings for the mapper, if any, may also be specified.
        Parameters:
        mapperClass - Mapper class.
        args - Zero or more argument strings for the mapper.
        Returns:
        Mapper config object for mapperClass.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if mapperClass is null.

      • mapper

        public <T extends Mapper<I,C,K,V>> MapperConfig<I,C,K,V> mapper(int copies,
                                                       java.lang.Class<T> mapperClass,
                                                       java.lang.String... args)
        Add the given number of copies of the given Mapper to this source. A source must have at least one mapper; it may have more than one mapper. The argument strings for the mappers, if any, may also be specified; each mapper has the same argument strings.
        Parameters:
        copies - Number of copies to add (≥ 1).
        mapperClass - Mapper class.
        args - Zero or more argument strings for the mappers.
        Returns:
        Mapper config object for mapperClass.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if copies < 1.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if mapperClass is null.

      • source

        public SourceConfig<I,C,K,V> source(Source<I,C> source)
        Add the given Source to this source's mapper task. For further information, see MapperTaskConfig.source().
        Parameters:
        source - Source.
        Returns:
        Source config object for source.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if source is null.
